WRITING.TEXT: none whatsoever, although he is much likelier to be unhappy if it's an expensive car...

WRITING.TITLE: I accidentally rear ended a mercedes with a midget driver...
WRITING.TEXT: he got out, looked at the damage and yelled "I am not happy!". I replied "fine, which one are you then?"

WRITING.TITLE: there's a gang of pickpockets targeting midgets in my town...
WRITING.TEXT: honestly, how could they stoop so low
